thread.section_title: Grand Hyatt Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Bad service
thread.title_full: Bad service - Review of Grand Hyatt Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Anood K
title: Bad service
text:
Myself with my colleagues stayed 4 nights and from the day I arrived I took bad impression up to the day am leaving.
1- no one took our bags when we arrived.
2- check-in took so long time although we arrived late around 4am since our flight was delayed and we have mentioned the same to hurry up.
3- We (myself and my colleague) carried our bags by ourselves to our rooms
4- the bed mattress not comfortable and the pillow too (surprised me)
5- rarely ppl speaks Eng.
6- concierge not helpful , Around 4:30pm asked about the hotel Italian restaurant and he guided me to go to 2nd floor. We I went and after 10mins trying to talk to someone eng there, I shocked it will open 5:30pm. Simply any concierge will give the time or mention it's closed now! I went again asked about restaurants, again no recommendation !
7- duty manager Jason, no Proffessional communication skills
All in all, I will never select the hotel for personal or business .
